DOC.brief_summary: The objective compare effect repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( rTMS ) combine sensory cueing ( SC ) , rTMS alone , conventional rehabilitation reduce unilateral neglect ( UN ) improve hemiplegic arm function performance activity daily live ( ADL ) . Sixty subacute patient leave UN right-hemispheric stroke randomly assign three group ; rTMS combine SC , rTMS alone , conventional rehabilitation . rTMS 1 Hz apply P5 contralesional hemisphere vibration cue emit use wristwatch device hemiplegic arm , five day per week two week . The first two group receive dosage conventional rehabilitation top experimental intervention . Blinded assessment administer baseline , 2 week postintervention , four-week follow-up upon completion training .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Combined With Sensory Cueing Unilateral Neglect Subacute Patients With Right Hemispheric Stroke
